name: Load Roll Die
storyline:
Forget being limited by a class type, in Load Roll Die your only limit is what faces you find each time you play. Become a tank by adding shields to your dice, explore wizardry by calling down lightning from above, become a face stealing rogue, or mix them all together with something else!

Each run fight your way through three procedurally generated worlds on your battle to the top. Steal a face from each enemy you beat to build the strongest dice set you can! Each run you encounter different maps, different dice, and different synergies to take down your opponents!

The die is the limit!
summary: Load your die in this dicebuilding roguelike all about creating and exploiting combos! Every face on your set of dice can be a unique weapon in your battle to the top. Duel enemies each with their own armament of dice and smash their faces, outplay their strategies, and deal deadly damage to take them out. Steal faces from enemies you beat to trade in at the store or incorporate into your winning strategy. The right combination of dice can let you tank damage, re-roll faces, create new dice from scratch and much more, but only if you play them right!
